item.title: CloudNews 4.0.2 released
item.content:encoded: This release fixes syncing with the newest version of Nextcloud News on the server

item.title: CloudNews 4.0.1 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNews is back with a completely rewritten version that has a fresh and responsive interface. And a brand new native app for macOS! 4.0.1 adds some important bug fixes.

item.title: CloudNews 4.0.0 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNews is back with a completely rewritten version that has a fresh and responsive interface. And a brand new native app for macOS!

item.title: CloudNotes acquired by Nextcloud
item.description: CloudNotes has been acquired by Nextcloud
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes has been acquired by Nextcloud.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.1.4 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.1.4 fixes a crash issue seem by some users.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.1.3 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.1.3 fixes a refresh issue while in offline mode.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.1.2 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.1.2 fixes a scrolling issue on smaller iPhones.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.1.1 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.1.1 fixes an issue with note titles in offline mode.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.1.0 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.1.0 improves the support for self-signed and other certificates that are not fully trusted by iOS.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.0.4 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.0.4 improves the support for lists in Markdown.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.0.3 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.0.3 Fixes bugs and improves performance.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.0.2 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.0.2 fixes a crash issue when editing notes.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.0.1 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 4.0.1 fixes a crash issue when creating a new note.

item.title: CloudNotes 4.0.0 released
item.content:encoded:
CloudNotes 4.0.0 is a major update with focus on Markdown support. Easily work with unordered, ordered, and task lists. Additionally the support for formatting source code in Markdown is much improved.

This version also adds support for additional Nextcloud Notes features such as specifying which folder to store notes in on the server and which file extension to use.

With this release ownCloud servers are no longer supported.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.7.3 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 3.7.3 fixes a crash bug

item.title: CloudNotes 3.7.2 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 3.7.2 fixes a crash bug

item.title: CloudNotes 3.7.1 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 3.7.1 fixes a crash bug

item.title: CloudNotes 3.7.0 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 3.7.0 provides fixes and enhancements to better support iOS 15.

item.title: CloudNews 3.13.0 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNews 3.13.0 adds several dark mode improvements.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.6.0 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes 3.6.0 add Korean localization and other minor enhancements.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.5.0 released
item.content:encoded:
CloudNotes 3.5.0 has the following enhancements:

  • Additional share formats
  • Support for printing
  • Support for any default mail client
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

item.title: CloudNotes 3.4.0 released
item.content:encoded:
CloudNotes 3.4.0 has the following enhancements:

  • Better support for servers hosted on the local network
  • More robust login flow
  • Czech localization
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

item.title: CloudNews 3.12.2 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNews 3.12.2 fixes several UI issues.

item.title: CloudNews 3.12.1 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNews 3.12.1 fixes a crash bug and layout issue.

item.title: CloudNews 3.12.0 released
item.description: Compact view, bug fixes and performance improvements
item.content:encoded:
• Compact view for the article list
  • Lots of under-the-hood improvements
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

item.title: CloudNotes 3.3.0 released
item.content:encoded: CloudNotes is now localized in French.

item.title: CloudNews 3.11.0 released
item.content:encoded:
• Dark mode improvements
  • Ability to sort oldest articles first
  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

item.title: CloudNews 3.10.0 released
item.content:encoded: Adds compatibility with upcoming versions of Nextcloud News.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.2.1 released
item.content:encoded: A small release with some bug fixes and performance improvements.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.2.0 released
item.content:encoded:
• Fixes an issue where the option to rename a note was not seen by some users.
  • Under-the-hood updates.
  • Minimum iOS required is now iOS 12.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.1.3 released
item.description: This update fixes an issue with dark mode.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.1.2 released
item.description: This update fixes an issue with search.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.1.1 released
item.description: This update fixes an issue with adding notes from other apps.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.1.0 released
item.content:encoded:
• Adds ability to manually edit note titles
  • Adds a context menu when long-pressing on a note in the list (iOS 13 and later)
  • Improved detection of Nextcloud or ownCloud.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.9 released
item.description: A small update with a bug fix for sharing text and URLs from other apps.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.8 released
item.description: A small update with a few stability and performance improvements.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.7 released
item.description: Adds ability to create notes directly from text in other apps.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.6 released
item.description: This version fixes a bug with editing categories.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.5 released
item.description: This version improves syncing between the app and the server.

item.title: CloudNotes for macOS 1.0.1 released
item.description: An update of CloudNotes for macOS with initial German localization.

item.title: CloudNotes for macOS 1.0.0 released
item.description: An initial release of CloudNotes for macOS. It is still beta quality software with several missing features.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.4 released
item.description: This version fixes a crash issue while editing. The delete button in the editor view also works again.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.3 released
item.description: This version includes stability and performance improvements.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.2 released
item.description: This version restores support for ownCloud Notes and self-signed certificates. It also fixes an issue with exporting notes.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.1 released
item.description: A quick bug fix release taking care of a few issues found with categories.

item.title: CloudNotes 3.0.0 released
item.description: This release is a complete rewrite of the app building a foundation for future updates.
item.content:encoded:
There are also new features like

  • Support for categories (folder). The top wishlist item by far.
  • Offline mode.
  • Support for dark mode.

item.title: CloudNews 3.9.1 released
item.description: This release fixes a crash issue experienced by some users.

item.title: CloudNews 3.9.0 released
item.description: This release includes support for iOS 13 including Dark Mode

item.title: CloudNews 3.8.5 released
item.description: This release includes performance improvements for embedded videos.

item.title: CloudNews 3.8.4 released
item.description: This release fixes a crash issue and improves navigation performance.

item.title: CloudNews 3.8.3 released
item.description: This release fixes a crash issue.

item.title: CloudNews 3.8.2 released
item.description: This release includes performance improvements based on user feedback.
